name: Under the neon guns
description:
Welcome, potential volunteer! 

We are here to offer you one of our wonderful terminals which can see the future! 

Please notice that they are not hackproof though, so please avoid dangerous contacts or paradoxes.

Our program is made not only to see the future but to execute an important mission, which one? it depends on where the terminal connects, we are still working to control it.

Are you interested in being a major part of our test program and maybe even on the entire human history? then try our program right now!

~ about the game ~

Under the neon guns is a gun n' run arcade game, similar to others like commando, gauntlet or ikari warriors.

short, but hard, the main focus is the gun you're using, each one of the five acts completely diferent, some gives you +1 of vitality, others can bounce around walls forever, you need to be careful to know which gun to pick and when to pick, picking all the guns may seem impossible, but it's the only way to actually get to the queen spot on the scoreboard.

enjoy your way trough a simple but deadly arena, every thing that you can collide with can be your only shield agains enemies stronger than you, keep your distance, and walk carefully.
